mapper.insert: insert into memberInfo(id, pw, email, name, birthdate, gender, agree, event, info, personal) values( #{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{name}, #{birthdate}, #{gender}, #{agree}, #{event}, #{info}, #{personal} )
mapper.select: select * from memberInfo where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
select * from memberInfo where id=#{id} and email=#{email}
select id from memberInfo where id=#{id}
